round knit one round with color a increase to 304 324 352 376 376 390 406 424 sts as follows using color a a k37 yo k75 3x yo k38 b no increase knit one round even c k6 yo k11 6x yo k12 15x yo k11 6x yo k6 d and e k4 yo k9 8x yo k8 23x yo k9 8x yo k4 f k3 yo k7 6x yo k6 41x yo k7 6x yo k3 g k3 * yo k6 repeat from * to last 3 sts yo k3 h k2 yo k5 22x yo k4 31x yo k5 22x yo k2 knit one round with color a knitting through the back of yos of previous round for size b knit one round even increase to 304 324 352 392 416 444 464 500 sts as follows using color a a b and c no increase knit one round even d k12 yo k23 4x yo k24 7x yo k23 4x yo k12 e k5 yo k9 12x yo k10 15x yo k9 12x yo k5 f k4 yo k7 21x yo k8 11x yo k7 21x yo k4 g k3 * yo k7 repeat from * to last 4 sts yo k4 h k3 yo k5 16x yo k6 43x yo k5 16x yo k3 knit one round with color a knitting through the back of yos of previous round for sizes a b and c knit one round even break color b and continue with color a until yoke measures 8 8 8 5 9 9 9 5 10 10 from cast on edge measuring straight down front of yoke fit tip put yoke sts on waste yarn and try on to see if the yoke is the right length for you work a few more rounds if necessary to bring the yoke to the correct length before dividing the sleeves from the body fit tip before dividing the sleeves and the body you may want to block the yoke as this is the last chance you ll have to lay it flat divide sleeves and body with color a k45 50 55 61 66 71 75 81 back sts transfer next 62 62 66 74 76 80 82 88 sts to waste yarn for sleeve cast on 8 10 12 12 14 16 20 20 sts for underarm k90 100 110 122 132 142 150 162 front sts transfer next 62 62 66 74 76 80 82 88 sts to waste yarn for sleeve cast on 8 10 12 12 14 16 20 20 sts for underarm knit to end of round there are now 196 220 244 268 292 316 340 364 sts on the needle for the
